title: Glasgow
name: City Chambers
hours: Guided tours M-F at 10:30 and 14:30. For individuals pre-booking is ''not'' necessary. A larger group needs to make a reservation: +44 141 287 4018
content: This imposing structure in George Square was built in 1888 in the Italian Renaissance style and is the headquarters of Glasgow City Council. Tours of the building are available daily, and visitors can see the magnificent marble staircases, lobbies, see the debating chamber and the lavish banqueting hall. Tours take about 45 min. In front the building, '''George Square''', the city's notional centre, is populated by several statues of civic leaders and famous figures from history and is often used for outdoor events.
